Features.MiniMap.Description: Provides options for restricting the usage of the minimap.
Features.MiniMap.AllowKeyBinding.Descrip: Choose whether players can use the default 'V' key-binding for the co-ordinates HUD.
Features.MiniMap.AllowCoordinatesHud.Des: Allows the option for the player to turn on the co-ordinates HUD within their settings menu.
Features.MiniMap.AllowCoordinatesOnHover: Whether or not to show co-ordinates when hovering over the mini-map.
Features.MiniMap.AllowMiniMapScrolling.D: Choose whether the player can click and drag the mini-map.
Features.MiniMap.MinimumZoomLevel.Descri: The minimum zoom level of the mini-map.
Features.MiniMap.DefaultZoomLevel.Descri: The default zoom level of the mini-map.
Features.MiniMap.MaximumZoomLevel.Descri: The maximum zoom level of the mini-map.
Features.MiniMap.EnsureMiniMapActive.Des: Force the mini-map to be available, regardless of server settings.
